subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Perhaps from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-kul||to instruct, explain, admonish}}. Compare {{cog|bo|སྐུལ་བ||to exhort}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[teach]]; to [[instruct]]; to [[lecture]]
# to [[explain]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[scold]]
# to [[train]]; to [[drill]]
# [[teachings]]; [[explanation]]; [[exegesis]]
# [[model]]
